name: AetherSurvivors
description:
Aether Survivors

You play as the lone survivor against an army of enemies who want to take you down and over run your city. Armed with a variety of weapons, you must fight to stay alive for 10 intense minutes. As you progress through the game, the enemies become stronger and more numerous, and you'll need to use all your skills and strategy to stay alive. With fast-paced gameplay and intense action, this game is a thrilling test of your survival skills. Can you survive against all odds and emerge victorious? Play now and find out!

Maps are randomly generated

The player shoots and utilizes skills automatically, so be sure to use your level-ups wisely!

Movement:

WASD - movement

Mouse Rotate - aim

ESC - pause

You'll get the best experience by downloading the game!

Henry Heino : Code and design

Kasper Myllykangas : Code and design, "Audio Specialist"

Ronja Oksanen : Graphics and design

Joonas Sarin: Code and design

This project was part of

Finnish College Game Jam 4

SOME textures: WithPoly
